review.title: “horrible, horrible horrible”
review.pros: Pros – pretty much nothing unless you consider air conditioning on a hot summer day a benefit
review.cons: Cons – exploitative wages - unsanitary conditions (phones are not cleaned although they do provide paper towels and rubbing alcohol for you to do so yourself - many are walking away with funky lip rashes after being there three days - rare that anyone lasts longer than a week or two - nothing but pushing right wing rumour mill under the guise of opinion polling
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – create a legit polling company
